item.title: Update WebScraping.AI Monthly Limit
item.description: https://webscraping.ai - Simple Web Scraping API with built-in parsing, Chrome rendering and proxies. 2000 free API calls per month.

item.title: Added PingPong pro plan offering
item.description: https://pingpong.one/ - Advanced status page platform with monitoring. Free tier includes one public customizable status page with SSL subdomain. Pro plan is offered to open-source projects and non-profits free of charge.

item.title: Add pingpong.one
item.description: https://pingpong.one/ - Advanced status page platform with monitoring. Free tier includes one public customizable status page with SSL subdomain.

item.title: Revert "Add 20i"
item.description: https://updrafts.app - WYSIWYG web site builder for tailwindcss based designs. Free for non-commercial usage.

item.title: docs(Design and UI): add Ant Design Landing Page
item.description: https://landing.ant.design/ - Landing Page](https://landing.ant.design/) - Ant Design Landing Page provides a template built by Ant Motion's motion components. It has a rich homepage template, downloads the template code package, and can be used quickly. You can also use the editor to quickly build your own dedicated page.

item.title: Add redirect.pizza
item.description: https://redirect.pizza/ - Easily manage redirects with HTTPS support. Free plan includes 10 sources and 100.000 hits per month.

item.title: Add Stormkit
item.description: https://stormkit.io/ - Integrate building, deploying and hosting seamlessly with your git flow of your JAMStack or Node.JS app. 50 GB bandwith and 10m requests for free per month including free SSL.

item.title: Fixed a spelling mistake
item.description: https://shrtco.de/docs - - Free URL Shortening API without authorization and no request limits.
